30namespace rtc {
31
32BasicPacketSocketFactory::BasicPacketSocketFactory()
33 : thread_(Thread::Current()), socket_factory_(NULL) {}
34
35BasicPacketSocketFactory::BasicPacketSocketFactory(Thread* thread)
36 : thread_(thread), socket_factory_(NULL) {}
37
38BasicPacketSocketFactory::BasicPacketSocketFactory(
39 SocketFactory* socket_factory)
40 : thread_(NULL), socket_factory_(socket_factory) {}
41
42BasicPacketSocketFactory::~BasicPacketSocketFactory() {}
43
44AsyncPacketSocket* BasicPacketSocketFactory::CreateUdpSocket(
45 const SocketAddress& address,
46 uint16_t min_port,
47 uint16_t max_port) {
48 // UDP sockets are simple.
49 AsyncSocket* socket =
50 socket_factory()->CreateAsyncSocket(address.family(), SOCK_DGRAM);
51 if (!socket) {
52 return NULL;
53 }
54 if (BindSocket(socket, address, min_port, max_port) < 0) {
55 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "UDP bind failed with error " << socket->GetError();
56 delete socket;
57 return NULL;
58 }
59 return new AsyncUDPSocket(socket);
60}
61
62AsyncPacketSocket* BasicPacketSocketFactory::CreateServerTcpSocket(
63 const SocketAddress& local_address,
64 uint16_t min_port,
65 uint16_t max_port,
66 int opts) {
67 // Fail if TLS is required.
68 if (opts & PacketSocketFactory::OPT_TLS) {
69 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "TLS support currently is not available.";
70 return NULL;
71 }
72
73 AsyncSocket* socket =
74 socket_factory()->CreateAsyncSocket(local_address.family(), SOCK_STREAM);
75 if (!socket) {
76 return NULL;
77 }
78
79 if (BindSocket(socket, local_address, min_port, max_port) < 0) {
80 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "TCP bind failed with error " << socket->GetError();
81 delete socket;
82 return NULL;
83 }
84
85 // Set TCP_NODELAY (via OPT_NODELAY) for improved performance; this causes
86 // small media packets to be sent immediately rather than being buffered up,
87 // reducing latency.
88 if (socket->SetOption(Socket::OPT_NODELAY, 1) != 0) {
89 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "Setting TCP_NODELAY option failed with error "
90 << socket->GetError();
91 }
92
93 // If using fake TLS, wrap the TCP socket in a pseudo-SSL socket.
94 if (opts & PacketSocketFactory::OPT_TLS_FAKE) {
95 RTC_DCHECK(!(opts & PacketSocketFactory::OPT_TLS));
96 socket = new AsyncSSLSocket(socket);
97 }
98
99 if (opts & PacketSocketFactory::OPT_STUN)
100 return new cricket::AsyncStunTCPSocket(socket, true);
101
102 return new AsyncTCPSocket(socket, true);
103}
104
105AsyncPacketSocket* BasicPacketSocketFactory::CreateClientTcpSocket(
106 const SocketAddress& local_address,
107 const SocketAddress& remote_address,
108 const ProxyInfo& proxy_info,
109 const std::string& user_agent,
110 const PacketSocketTcpOptions& tcp_options) {
111 AsyncSocket* socket =
112 socket_factory()->CreateAsyncSocket(local_address.family(), SOCK_STREAM);
113 if (!socket) {
114 return NULL;
115 }
116
117 if (BindSocket(socket, local_address, 0, 0) < 0) {
118 // Allow BindSocket to fail if we're binding to the ANY address, since this
119 // is mostly redundant in the first place. The socket will be bound when we
120 // call Connect() instead.
121 if (local_address.IsAnyIP()) {
122 RTC_LOG(LS_WARNING) << "TCP bind failed with error " << socket->GetError()
123 << "; ignoring since socket is using 'any' address.";
124 } else {
125 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "TCP bind failed with error " << socket->GetError();
126 delete socket;
127 return NULL;
128 }
129 }
130
131 // Set TCP_NODELAY (via OPT_NODELAY) for improved performance; this causes
132 // small media packets to be sent immediately rather than being buffered up,
133 // reducing latency.
134 //
135 // Must be done before calling Connect, otherwise it may fail.
136 if (socket->SetOption(Socket::OPT_NODELAY, 1) != 0) {
137 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "Setting TCP_NODELAY option failed with error "
138 << socket->GetError();
139 }
140
141 // If using a proxy, wrap the socket in a proxy socket.
142 if (proxy_info.type == PROXY_SOCKS5) {
143 socket = new AsyncSocksProxySocket(
144 socket, proxy_info.address, proxy_info.username, proxy_info.password);
145 } else if (proxy_info.type == PROXY_HTTPS) {
146 socket =
147 new AsyncHttpsProxySocket(socket, user_agent, proxy_info.address,
148 proxy_info.username, proxy_info.password);
149 }
150
151 // Assert that at most one TLS option is used.
152 int tlsOpts = tcp_options.opts & (PacketSocketFactory::OPT_TLS |
153 PacketSocketFactory::OPT_TLS_FAKE |
154 PacketSocketFactory::OPT_TLS_INSECURE);
155 RTC_DCHECK((tlsOpts & (tlsOpts - 1)) == 0);
156
157 if ((tlsOpts & PacketSocketFactory::OPT_TLS) ||
158 (tlsOpts & PacketSocketFactory::OPT_TLS_INSECURE)) {
159 // Using TLS, wrap the socket in an SSL adapter.
160 SSLAdapter* ssl_adapter = SSLAdapter::Create(socket);
161 if (!ssl_adapter) {
162 return NULL;
163 }
164
165 if (tlsOpts & PacketSocketFactory::OPT_TLS_INSECURE) {
166 ssl_adapter->SetIgnoreBadCert(true);
167 }
168
169 ssl_adapter->SetAlpnProtocols(tcp_options.tls_alpn_protocols);
170 ssl_adapter->SetEllipticCurves(tcp_options.tls_elliptic_curves);
171 ssl_adapter->SetCertVerifier(tcp_options.tls_cert_verifier);
172
173 socket = ssl_adapter;
174
175 if (ssl_adapter->StartSSL(remote_address.hostname().c_str()) != 0) {
176 delete ssl_adapter;
177 return NULL;
178 }
179
180 } else if (tlsOpts & PacketSocketFactory::OPT_TLS_FAKE) {
181 // Using fake TLS, wrap the TCP socket in a pseudo-SSL socket.
182 socket = new AsyncSSLSocket(socket);
183 }
184
185 if (socket->Connect(remote_address) < 0) {
186 RTC_LOG(LS_ERROR) << "TCP connect failed with error " << socket->GetError();
187 delete socket;
188 return NULL;
189 }
190
191 // Finally, wrap that socket in a TCP or STUN TCP packet socket.
192 AsyncPacketSocket* tcp_socket;
193 if (tcp_options.opts & PacketSocketFactory::OPT_STUN) {
194 tcp_socket = new cricket::AsyncStunTCPSocket(socket, false);
195 } else {
196 tcp_socket = new AsyncTCPSocket(socket, false);
197 }
198
199 return tcp_socket;
200}
201
202AsyncResolverInterface* BasicPacketSocketFactory::CreateAsyncResolver() {
203 return new AsyncResolver();
204}
205
206int BasicPacketSocketFactory::BindSocket(AsyncSocket* socket,
207 const SocketAddress& local_address,
208 uint16_t min_port,
209 uint16_t max_port) {
210 int ret = -1;
211 if (min_port == 0 && max_port == 0) {
212 // If there's no port range, let the OS pick a port for us.
213 ret = socket->Bind(local_address);
214 } else {
215 // Otherwise, try to find a port in the provided range.
216 for (int port = min_port; ret < 0 && port <= max_port; ++port) {
217 ret = socket->Bind(SocketAddress(local_address.ipaddr(), port));
218 }
219 }
220 return ret;
221}
222
223SocketFactory* BasicPacketSocketFactory::socket_factory() {
224 if (thread_) {
225 RTC_DCHECK(thread_ == Thread::Current());
226 return thread_->socketserver();
227 } else {
228 return socket_factory_;
229 }
230}
231
232} // namespace rtc
